Events.OnAcceptedUndock:
(block ( (ownerObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (etaCetiGateObj (sysGetStargateLeadingToNode 'EC))
; Pick a point 600 light-seconds away from the Cathedral, away from the ; destination stargate.
(startCenterPos (sysVectorPolarOffset ownerObj (sysVectorAngle ownerObj etaCetiGateObj) 600))
; Now pick a random point within 100 light-seconds for the convoy ; to start at.
(convoyPos (sysVectorRandom startCenterPos 100 60 "TAE"))
targetObj )
; Create Penitent destroyer

(msnRegisterForEvents gSource targetObj) (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID targetObj))
; Create escorts
(for i 1 (random 3 4) (block (escortObj) (setq escortObj (sysCreateShip &scRepentant; convoyPos &svPenitents;)) (shpOrder escortObj 'escort targetObj) ) )
(msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch (and (= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'rescue) (= (msnGetData gSource 'fionaStatus) 'wrecked) ) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'fionaWreckID)) 'dock)
(= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'rescue) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'wreckID)) 'dock)
(rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'targetID))) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch ; If wreck was destroyed, then we fail (should never happen, ; because we make the wreck immutable).
(= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'wreckID)) (msnFailure gSource)
; Deal with Fiona getting killed
(= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'fionaID)) (block Nil (objSetEventHandler aWreckObj &evBenedict07FionaWreck;) (objSetProperty aWreckObj 'maxStructuralHP 0) (msnSetData gSource 'fionaStatus 'wrecked) (msnSetData gSource 'fionaWreckID (objGetID aWreckObj))
(objSendMessage gPlayerShip aWreckObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgFionaWrecked)) )
; If not the target, then ignore
(!= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) Nil
; If the target entered a stargate, then we lose
(= aDestroyReason 'enteredStargate) (msnFailure gSource)
; If no wreck, the mission failure (should never happen)
(not aWreckObj) (msnFailure gSource)
; Otherwise, if the target was destroyed, then the player needs to dock with the wreck
(block ( (fionaObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'fionaID))) (sandovalObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'sandovalID))) )
; Set up the wreck
(objSetEventHandler aWreckObj &evBenedict07PenitentWreck;) (objSetProperty aWreckObj 'maxStructuralHP 0) (msnSetData gSource 'wreckID (objGetID aWreckObj)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource aWreckObj)
; Order Fiona to dock
(if fionaObj (block () (objSetEventHandler fionaObj Nil) (shpCancelOrders fionaObj) (shpOrder fionaObj 'sendMessage gPlayerShip (msnTranslate gSource 'msgDidIt)) (shpOrder fionaObj 'dock aWreckObj) ) )
; Order Sandoval to orbit (can't patrol, because wreck is enemy, and ; patrolling will cause Sandoval to attack us).
(if sandovalObj (block () (objSetEventHandler sandovalObj Nil) (shpCancelOrders sandovalObj) (if (= (msnGetData gSource 'fionaStatus) 'wrecked) (shpOrder sandovalObj 'sendMessage gPlayerShip (msnTranslate gSource 'msgCoverYouGetFiona)) (shpOrder sandovalObj 'sendMessage gPlayerShip (msnTranslate gSource 'msgCoverYou)) ) (shpOrder sandovalObj 'orbit aWreckObj 8) ) )
(msnSetData gSource 'status 'rescue) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) ) )
Events.OnCompleted:
(switch (= aReason 'success) (block ( (etaCetiGateObj (sysGetStargateLeadingToNode 'EC)) (fionaObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'fionaID))) (sandovalObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'sandovalID))) )
; Fiona and Sandoval leave
(if fionaObj (block () (shpCancelOrders fionaObj) (shpOrder fionaObj 'gate etaCetiGateObj) ) )
(if sandovalObj (block () (shpCancelOrders sandovalObj) (shpOrder sandovalObj 'gate etaCetiGateObj) ) ) )
(= aReason 'failure) (block ( (skGateObj (sysGetStargateLeadingToNode 'SK)) (fionaObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'fionaID))) (sandovalObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'sandovalID))) )
; If Fiona is wrecked, then nothing
(if (= (msnGetData gSource 'fionaStatus) 'wrecked) (block ( (fionaWreckObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'fionaWreckID))) ) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip fionaWreckObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgBenedictDead1)) ) )
; Fiona and Sandoval return to SK
(if fionaObj (block () (objSetEventHandler fionaObj Nil) (shpCancelOrders fionaObj) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip fionaObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgBenedictDead1)) (shpOrder fionaObj 'wait 6) (shpOrder fionaObj 'sendMessage gPlayerShip (msnTranslate gSource 'msgBenedictDead2)) (shpOrder fionaObj 'gate skGateObj) ) )
(if sandovalObj (block () (objSetEventHandler sandovalObj Nil) (shpCancelOrders sandovalObj) (shpOrder sandovalObj 'wait 3) (shpOrder sandovalObj 'sendMessage gPlayerShip (msnTranslate gSource 'msgBenedictDead3)) (shpOrder sandovalObj 'escort fionaObj) (shpOrder sandovalObj 'gate skGateObj) ) ) ) )

(switch ; If we never got the Penitent infiltration mission, tell the player ; what Benedict found.
(not (msnFind "r +unid:&msInfiltratePenitents;; +property:isSuccess;")) (append (msnTranslate gSource 'Intro.benedictExpo) (msnTranslate gSource 'Intro.circleOfObligation) )
(append (msnTranslate gSource 'Intro.default) (msnTranslate gSource 'Intro.circleOfObligation) ) )

After extracting proof implicating Sister Elana Ston in a conspiracy, Benedict was captured by Penitents.
Though Fiona failed to convince the Sisters about Elana Ston's betrayal, you have an opportunity to rescue Benedict.
He's aboard a Penitent ship passing through the system. Help Fiona and Sandoval rescue him.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

At great cost, Benedict extracted a video showing Sister Elana Ston handing over a group of infants to the Penitents. Fiona failed to convince the rest of the Sisters, however, because Sister Ston tampered with the video to make it look like a forgery.
But Benedict knows where the children are being kept, and he's planning a rescue mission.
If you wish to help, go to the %systemName% system.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

Though you rescued Benedict, you are no closer to unravelling the mystery of the Penitents and the Sisters. Perhaps your questions will not be answered until you reach Domina at the Galactic Core.
No further progress on this storyline is possible.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

You have failed. Benedict was being help prisoner inside a Penitent ship. You attempted a rescue, but the Penitent ship escaped through the stargate.
No further progress on this storyline is possible.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

The beautiful central chamber, built hundreds of years ago by Saint Eugenia, is lit by the holograms of various Sisters. Lay and ordained women walk through the halls in quiet conversation.
You see Fiona and Sandoval pacing in front of a large meteorsteel door.
Fiona frowns, "No, but we're waiting for an audience with the Circle of Obligation, the Sisters' leadership. They'll help us."

"I talked to Sister Oriela, the grandmatriarch of the Sisters. I gave her the video ROM of Sister Ston talking to the Penitents. She's convened a meeting of the Circle to formally charge Sister Ston."
Just then, the meteorsteel door opens and all of you are led inside.

The beautiful central chamber, built hundreds of years ago by Saint Eugenia, is lit by the holograms of various Sisters. Lay and ordained women walk through the halls in quiet conversation.
You see Fiona and Sandoval pacing in front of a large meteorsteel door.

Fiona frowns, "You haven't heard? He was captured by Penitents!"
Sandoval interjects, "Actually, I think he's working them from the inside. He's not as stupid as I thought."

Sandoval smiles, "We had the perfect plan! Benedict and I infiltrated a Penitent station looking for evidence—and we found some! We've got a video ROM of Sister Ston making a deal with the Penitents."
"But we almost got caught and Benedict stayed behind to give me a chance to escape."

Fiona is furious, "She's betrayed us! And with the video we can prove it!"
"We're waiting for an audience with the Circle of Obligation, the Sisters' leadership. They'll help us."

"I talked to Sister Oriela, the grandmatriarch of the Sisters. I gave her the video ROM and she's convened a meeting of the Circle to formally charge Sister Ston."
Just then, the meteorsteel door opens and all of you are led inside.

The Circle of Obligation sits at a curved table in front of you. The grandmatriarch, clad in a high collar that hides her many wrinkles, stands as you enter.
To her right, Sister Colleen McMurray, long rumored to be her successor, nods to Fiona.
Sister Elana Ston frowns at one edge of the table. She occasionally looks behind her at a pair of guards.

The grandmatriach sits down, "Fiona, will you tell us your story?"
Fiona recounts how a murder investigation led her to suspect that Sister Ston was plotting with the Penitent Order. She lauds Benedict, who obtained video evidence, at the cost of his own freedom and possibly his life.

Fiona shows the video to the assembled Sisters. The room explodes in chaos when they see Sister Ston delivering a dozen infants to the Penitents.
The grandmatriach silences them, "Enough! We are not finished yet."
She continues, "Thank you Fiona. Now let us hear from Sister Isabel, our cybertech."

Fiona shoots a look of panic at Sandoval.
Sister Isabel steps forward: "Right. Well, I've analyzed Fiona's video, and I'm sorry to say that it has 53 distinct stream artifacts and probably a dozen injection sites..."
McMurray interrupts her, "Sister, would you summarize, please?"

Sister Isabel looks at Fiona and then at the floor: "The video is a fake. Probably a splice or a hypervisualized..."
"Thank you, Sister Isabel!" says the grandmatriarch with a wave. "Fiona, I'm afraid you've been the unwitting pawn in an effort to bring discord to our Sisterhood."

Sister Ston rises with a smile. "I bear no ill will, Fiona. No doubt the Penitents are trying to undermine us. Perhaps this Benedict is himself involved. I'm glad the truth was revealed in time."
Guards usher you all out of the room, and the meteorsteel door shuts firmly.

Fiona's face is flushed. "We've been played! The grandmatriarch..."
Sandoval interrupts, "Played by whom, eh? Maybe Sister Ston is right about Benedict. He could have planned the whole thing from the beginning."

Fiona agrees, "And I don't trust Sister Ston. But if the grandmatriarch is involved..."
Just then, Sister Colleen McMurray appears from a side corridor. "If the grandmatriarch were involved, you'd all be dead! But don't look for help from her either."

"The Sisterhood is compromised; schism is inevitable.
"And it's all %his% fault," she says, pointing at you.

"Maybe not you, specifically, but a pilgrim. One of the pilgrims beamed back her logbooks before she died. The contents are secret still, but they've already sparked conflict in the Circle of Obligation."
"Maybe you'll find out yourself. But it doesn't matter now; the damage is done. All you can do is get far away from here. Save yourselves."

"I didn't say give up! There's one more service you can perform. My spies tell me that Benedict is still alive.
"He's on a convoy, being taken to Eta Ceti. He'll pass through this system soon. If you leave now, you'll have a chance to free him."

Fiona looks at you and Sandoval. "If there's a chance we can save Benedict, we need to take it."
"Please help me rescue him."

Sandoval nods at you.
"You've got the best ship, pet. We'll follow your lead!"
"OK, but don't take too long. That convoy will be here any time now."
Fiona is desperate, "We gotta get out there! We'll never catch up to the convoy if we don't leave now!"
Mission complete!
You decide to wait for Fiona.

Fiona calls you on the comms.
"Come get me! I can help you rescue Benedict!"

Fiona meets you at the airlock.
"I'm all right. Let's get to the wreckage and rescue Benedict!"

Fiona meets you at the airlock.
"Don't let that Penitent ship get away! Come back for me when you're done!"

You enter the smoking wreckage of the Penitent ship. Fiona carries a datapad controlling a squad of autons.
You make your way slowly, dispatching all resistance. Finally, the autons detect a figure running towards you.
"Hold," says Fiona.

Benedict appears. A bloody arm hangs uselessly at his side, but he walks proudly. He rushes to embrace Fiona.
"I'm OK," he says to her, "But we need to get out of here."

Fiona agrees, "Stormhound was right. We can't trust the Sisters! We can't go back there!"
But Benedict insists, "I know where they took the children! They're in Eta Ceti, probably part of some experiment! We've got to save them."

Fiona breaks away, shaking her head. "We've got no support! You know we'll never make it."
But Benedict takes her hands, "Fiona, I don't know who I was before the mindwipe. But I know who I am now! I'm someone who would risk everything to save those children. That's who I want to be!"

Fiona beams a smile at Benedict, "I won't let you go alone again. Together to the end, OK?"
Benedict hugs her. Then he turns to you. "I can't ask you to come with us. Who knows what Domina plans for you. But if you find yourself in Eta Ceti, we could use your help."
Fiona smiles at you. "Thank you. We'll see you there!"
Benedict nods. "I know. I don't envy you. Goodbye, %name%."

Fiona agrees, "Stormhound was right. We can't trust the Sisters! We can't go back there!"
Benedict takes Fiona's hand, "I don't know who I was before the mindwipe, but I know who I am now. And I know who I want to be with.
"I don't care where we go, as long as it's together."

Fiona beams a smile at Benedict, "I won't let you go alone again. Together to the end, OK?"
Benedict hugs her. Then he turns to you. "Whatever the Sisters and the Penitents are up to, it all leads back to you and your mission.
"I don't know what you'll find when you reach Domina, but I have a feeling we're not going to like it.
"Goodbye, %name%."
Nooooo!
Let's get the hell out of here.
Sorry, kid, you're on your own.
I'll cover you! Get Benedict!
I'll cover you! Get Fiona!
We got it!
I'm OK! Proceed with the mission!

Message.name: Attack target
Message.Invoke:
(switch (eq (objGetTarget gSender) gSource) (objSendMessage gSender gSource (objTranslate gSource 'IcantAttackMyself "\"Unable to comply\""))
(and (not (objIsEnemy gPlayerShip (objGetTarget gSender))) (not (objIsAngryAt (objGetTarget gSender) gPlayerShip)) ) (objSendMessage gSender gSource (objTranslate gSource 'IcantAttackFriends "\"Unable to comply\""))
(block Nil (shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'attack (objGetTarget gSender))
(objSetData gSource "behavior" 'attackingTarget) (objSendMessage gSender gSource (objTranslate gSource 'AttackTargetAck "\"Acknowledged\"")) ) )

Message.name: Break & attack
Message.Invoke:
(block (theTarget) (switch (or (not (setq theTarget (sysFindObject gPlayerShip "sTYAN"))) (gr (objGetDistance gPlayerShip theTarget) 100) ) (objSendMessage gSender gSource (objTranslate gSource 'NoTargetInRange "\"No target in range\""))
(block Nil (shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'attack theTarget)
(objSetData gSource "behavior" 'attackingAtWill) (objSendMessage gSender gSource (objTranslate gSource 'AttackTargetAck "\"Acknowledged\"")) ) ) )

Message.name: Form up
Message.Invoke:
(block (behavior) (setq behavior (objGetData gSource "behavior")) (switch (eq behavior 'escorting) (block Nil (objCommunicate gSource gSender 'FormUp) (objSendMessage gSender gSource (objTranslate gSource 'FormUpAck "\"Acknowledged\"")) )
(block Nil (shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'follow gPlayerShip)
(objSetData gSource "behavior" 'escorting) (if (or (eq behavior 'attackingTarget) (eq behavior 'attackingAtWill)) (objSendMessage gSender gSource (objTranslate gSource 'CancelAttackAck "\"Acknowledged\"")) (objSendMessage gSender gSource (objTranslate gSource 'FormUpAck "\"Acknowledged\"")) ) ) ) )

(and (eq (setq armorDamage (objGetVisibleDamage gSource)) 0) (or (eq (setq shieldLevel (objGetShieldLevel gSource)) 100) (eq shieldLevel -1)) ) (objTranslate gSource 'Status100Percent "\"No damage\"")
(eq armorDamage 0) (cat "Shields down to " shieldLevel "%")
(cat "Armor is " armorDamage "% damaged") ) )
(objSetShowAsDestination gSource 'autoclear) )
